645     *  <p>Contains addresses for carts with multiple shipping addresses. Line items reference these addresses under their <code>shippingDetails</code>. The addresses captured here are not used to determine eligible shipping methods or the applicable tax rate. Only the cart's <code>shippingAddress</code> is used for this.</p>
646     */
647
648    public QuoteBuilder plusItemShippingAddresses(
649            Function<com.commercetools.api.models.common.AddressBuilder, com.commercetools.api.models.common.AddressBuilder> builder) {
650        if (this.itemShippingAddresses == null) {
651            this.itemShippingAddresses = new ArrayList<>();
652        }
653        this.itemShippingAddresses.add(builder.apply(com.commercetools.api.models.common.AddressBuilder.of()).build());
654        return this;
655    }
656

886
887    public Quote build() {
888        Objects.requireNonNull(id, Quote.class + ": id is missing");
889        Objects.requireNonNull(version, Quote.class + ": version is missing");
890        Objects.requireNonNull(createdAt, Quote.class + ": createdAt is missing");
891        Objects.requireNonNull(lastModifiedAt, Quote.class + ": lastModifiedAt is missing");
892        Objects.requireNonNull(quoteRequest, Quote.class + ": quoteRequest is missing");
893        Objects.requireNonNull(stagedQuote, Quote.class + ": stagedQuote is missing");
894        Objects.requireNonNull(lineItems, Quote.class + ": lineItems is missing");
895        Objects.requireNonNull(customLineItems, Quote.class + ": customLineItems is missing");
896        Objects.requireNonNull(totalPrice, Quote.class + ": totalPrice is missing");
897        Objects.requireNonNull(taxMode, Quote.class + ": taxMode is missing");
898        Objects.requireNonNull(taxRoundingMode, Quote.class + ": taxRoundingMode is missing");
899        Objects.requireNonNull(taxCalculationMode, Quote.class + ": taxCalculationMode is missing");
900        return new QuoteImpl(id, version, createdAt, lastModifiedAt, key, lastModifiedBy, createdBy, quoteRequest,
901            stagedQuote, customer, customerGroup, validTo, sellerComment, store, lineItems, customLineItems, totalPrice,
902            taxedPrice, shippingAddress, billingAddress, inventoryMode, taxMode, taxRoundingMode, taxCalculationMode,
903            country, shippingInfo, paymentInfo, shippingRateInput, itemShippingAddresses, directDiscounts, custom);
904    }
905
906    /**
907     * builds Quote without checking for non null required values
908     */
909    public Quote buildUnchecked() {
910        return new QuoteImpl(id, version, createdAt, lastModifiedAt, key, lastModifiedBy, createdBy, quoteRequest,
911            stagedQuote, customer, customerGroup, validTo, sellerComment, store, lineItems, customLineItems, totalPrice,
912            taxedPrice, shippingAddress, billingAddress, inventoryMode, taxMode, taxRoundingMode, taxCalculationMode,
913            country, shippingInfo, paymentInfo, shippingRateInput, itemShippingAddresses, directDiscounts, custom);
914    }
915
916    public static QuoteBuilder of() {
917        return new QuoteBuilder();
918    }
919
920    public static QuoteBuilder of(final Quote template) {
921        QuoteBuilder builder = new QuoteBuilder();
922        builder.id = template.getId();
923        builder.version = template.getVersion();
924        builder.createdAt = template.getCreatedAt();
925        builder.lastModifiedAt = template.getLastModifiedAt();
926        builder.key = template.getKey();
927        builder.lastModifiedBy = template.getLastModifiedBy();
928        builder.createdBy = template.getCreatedBy();
929        builder.quoteRequest = template.getQuoteRequest();
930        builder.stagedQuote = template.getStagedQuote();
931        builder.customer = template.getCustomer();
932        builder.customerGroup = template.getCustomerGroup();
933        builder.validTo = template.getValidTo();
934        builder.sellerComment = template.getSellerComment();
935        builder.store = template.getStore();
936        builder.lineItems = template.getLineItems();
937        builder.customLineItems = template.getCustomLineItems();
938        builder.totalPrice = template.getTotalPrice();
939        builder.taxedPrice = template.getTaxedPrice();
940        builder.shippingAddress = template.getShippingAddress();
941        builder.billingAddress = template.getBillingAddress();
942        builder.inventoryMode = template.getInventoryMode();
943        builder.taxMode = template.getTaxMode();
944        builder.taxRoundingMode = template.getTaxRoundingMode();
945        builder.taxCalculationMode = template.getTaxCalculationMode();
946        builder.country = template.getCountry();
947        builder.shippingInfo = template.getShippingInfo();
948        builder.paymentInfo = template.getPaymentInfo();
949        builder.shippingRateInput = template.getShippingRateInput();
950        builder.itemShippingAddresses = template.getItemShippingAddresses();
951        builder.directDiscounts = template.getDirectDiscounts();
952        builder.custom = template.getCustom();
953        return builder;
954    }
